overview:
Lisa Kline is an iconic clothing retailer, merchandiser and designer with an eye for whatâ€™s sexy, cool, casual and hip. She is the CEO and founder of Lisa Kline, Lisa Kline Men and Lisa Kline Kids Retail Stores on the famed Robertson Blvd that bare her name. Lisa has established herself as an innovator and trendsetter in her industry as well as a trusted style source for many actors, recording artists, and other celebrity clients. People come to Lisa Kline from all across the country and world to get the latest brands and the coolest clothing in the market place.

Lisa has been featured as a fashion expert on television shows like Good Morning America, MTV, VH1, Style File, E! News, Mel Bâ€™s Itâ€™s a Scary World, and Fox 11. She appeared as one of four panel judges on the popular Bravo TV show â€˜Launch My Lineâ€™ and is in the process of writing a book. She currently lives in Studio City with her two children, her giant English Mastiff, and her famous Malaccan Cockatoo.
